duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support over the phone, through remote access, and in person to company employees.
Configure, troubleshoot, and support desktops, laptops, printers, phones, etc.
Provide support for email, enterprise applications, and web applications.
Respond to and resolve submitted work orders within the IT helpdesk queue.
Create and manage accounts in Active Directory and manage Cloud services.
Perform Windows Scripting using common scripting languages.

education_certification.credential: Certifications (Microsoft, CompTIA, Cisco, etc.) required, without above work experience.
